headline.main: WOMEN ARE URGED TO COMBAT RUMORS; Mrs. Hobby Asks Volunteer Group to Report Propaganda Damaging to Army

lead_paragraph: Women interested in serving the national defense program were urged by the War Department yesterday to concentrate on 'a campaign to quell "rumors propagated by Axis governments and their agents in this country."
abstract: Urges women to help combat Axis propaganda damaging to U S Army, Amer Women's Voluntary Services Natl Training Inst
snippet: Women interested in serving the national defense program were urged by the War Department yesterday to concentrate on 'a campaign to quell "rumors propagated by Axis governments and their agents in this country."...
